channel.title: A train bug while it's in the elevator [Fixed]
channel.description: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eU8U0Ux25jQ&feature=plcp[/url] It's nothing extremely serious, but when you use the train while it's in the elevator it simply goes back up to the top and stays there. *How to avoid* Don't use the train :smiley:
